name: Taking out the Trash (SelfMadeGames)
description:
Taking out the Trash [v.01] is a 3D physics-based minigame. The game was developed in 6 days and submitted to a private rapid ideation event, the theme being, 'Cop26'.

OBJECTIVES

Your goal is to clean the streets! Collect trash and throw it in dumpsters to generate points. Dumpsters yield different points depending on how fast they are moving.

CONTROLS

  • Use the arrow keys or W, A, S, D to move
  • MB1 - Pick up trash / MB2 - Throw trash
  • Press 'ESC' to pause the game
  • Press 'spacebar' to jump

Work Times

Message from the Developer!

Thanks very much for downloading my game! Any comments and or feedback will be greatly appreciated. This is only a demo to show off mechanics, and therefore it is a minigame. 

Known Bugs

  • The player can exit the starting area
  • Bins and dumpsters do not respawn on 'Restart'
  • Dumpsters have mass and are not kinematic
